page.title: 04WELSH SPEAKERS,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: Recently our school,{Ysgol Bryn Collen carried out a survey of how many children in school speak{welsh . We found that approximately{6.5 % of the{children}speak welsh, while {20%}of their{grandparents}speak welsh and{15%}of{parents}speak welsh.We have so few welsh speakers because Llangollen is only eight miles away from the{english border}and many english people come to live in Llangollen. It is possible that if this pattern continues, in one hundred years no children will speak welsh . However, we all have{welsh lessons every day. We learn{welsh songs,poems {and hymns,}and we have{welsh {assemblies}and an{Urdd}group (a welsh club ). Young children start learning welsh in our nursery . Hopefully everyone will speak welsh though it will not be their first language.
